name: Blood In Pixels Online'
description:
This is the new MMORPG ONLINE BETA SERVER

BLOOD IN PIXELS ONLINE!

We have almost two years in development and we release a first client in 19-08!  Let's adventure with our characters, Hinna Hiedfrigg as Warrior, Yuki Selenian as Archer, Mage as Clark Syrius and Assassin is Dant Auryn! 

Explore the Sul-Terra World in this new MMORPG ONLINE! Take a time to mine, fishing and cultive your herbs! Collect loots and complete the adventure quests!
